#!/bin/bash
# Check if this is a git commit command
if echo "$TOOL_PARAMS" | grep -q '"command".*git commit'; then
  echo 'ğŸ§ª Running tests before commit...'
  xcodebuild test -scheme JustAMapTests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 16' -quiet 2>&1 | grep -E '(Test Suite|error:|failed|passed)' || true
  test_result=$?
  if [ $test_result -ne 0 ]; then
    echo 'âŒ Tests failed! Blocking commit. Please fix the failing tests first.'
    exit 1
  fi
  echo 'âœ… All tests passed! Proceeding with commit...'
fi
